attributes.review: Ok so I downloaded this app to see if I could contribute to our great president and country but when I opened it, it showed some rotten wrinkly orange having intercourse with a obese 13 year old boy and shooting orange creamsicles into the boys intestines right after that my fish tried to do the same thing with our algae eater now I have to buy separate tanks right after that my phone grew a tail and that wasnâ€™t even the worst part, my phone was crying all over my little babyâ€™s head phones thatâ€™s why I no longer support Donald J Trump
attributes.title: Fat Kid cream pie

attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to learn more about Trumps positions on specific issues but instead I was blasted with merchandise! My entire family wears a strict dress code of periwinkle, olive and beige so none of the merchandise offered is in dress code. I ignored it and closed the app only to find my clothes had been converted entirely into red and white maga merch. Embarrassed, I ran for my closet before any of my family noticed and initiated the shame ritual (our punishment for dress code violations) but when I looked at my wardrobe it was also filled with Trump 2020 t-shirts, hats and board shorts! My husband found me in the fetal position of our closet floor and decided to look at the app I was babbling about only to have his own clothes also ruined. My entire family is now forced to wear the the offensive color combo at all times, as any article of clothing we desire is immediately changed. We are now stuck in constant cycle performing the shaming ritual on each other as we all have been cursed to break dress code forever...
attributes.title: Ruined my Clothes!
